    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">Javascript实现asp.net mvc的checkbox基本功能</span>
    

</a>

		</h1>
		<div class="clear"></div>
		<div class="postBody">
			<div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
Html的checkbox使用很广的，它的状态，勾选与非选。<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107114303083-1820071253.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107114303083-1820071253.jpg" alt=""></a>
<p>&nbsp;</p>


初始状态，默认为非选。你可以设置它是勾选，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107114904723-1579407913.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107114904723-1579407913.jpg" alt=""></a>
<p>直在checkbox 标签中，添加checked属性。<br><br>另外，在javascript可以这样，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').checked = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">true</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>或者，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').setAttribute('checked', 'checked')</pre>
</div>
<p><br>或者，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').setAttribute('checked', <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">null</span>);</pre>
</div>
<p><br>或者，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').setAttribute('checked', '');</pre>
</div>
<p>Insus.NET测试与发觉，以上代码，均是勾选，</p>
<p>&nbsp;但你想它是非选，可以不用设置任何值，<br>或者给它设置任意值，并在值前添加感叹号(<span style="color: rgba(255, 0, 0, 1)">!</span>)<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107130702090-1256201219.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107130702090-1256201219.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p>或者，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').checked = <span style="color: rgba(0, 0, 255, 1)">false</span>;</pre>
</div>
<p><br>或者，</p>
<div class="cnblogs_code">
<pre>getById('Checkbox_IsPublished').removeAttribute('checked')</pre>
</div>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>看到了否，获取element的id,Insus.NET有使用一个getById('xxx')，其实是Insus.NET为了少输入英文，重构了它，如下，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107131411443-1237943029.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107131411443-1237943029.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>以上所有涉及，checkbox呈现给用户使用，<br>它的值用户选择与否，ms sql 表中，(Design)<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132433575-1951195781.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132433575-1951195781.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p>(Edit top 200 Rows),<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132624426-424737040.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132624426-424737040.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p><br>(Query Select语句)，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132802193-970524920.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107132802193-970524920.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>下面，checkbox在编辑页面，页面加载时，需要把用户以前选择状态绑定。该勾选是勾选，如果没有未勾选的，让其显示未选中新状态。<br>简单一点，就是把数据库表中存储的值，直接赋予即可。<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107133636172-1024422176.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107133636172-1024422176.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
<p>&nbsp;想复杂一点，代码得写多一些，<br><a href="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107133940719-1782626505.jpg" target="_blank"><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/28036/202501/28036-20250107133940719-1782626505.jpg" alt=""></a></p>
